# base_agent

The `BaseAgent` class for LLM agents.

## <ApiType type="Alias" path="agents/base_agent/index" symbolName="Context" /> Context

Context for LLM calls.

## <ApiType type="Alias" path="agents/base_agent/index" symbolName="LLM" /> LLM

The base interface for LLM models.

## <ApiType type="Alias" path="agents/base_agent/index" symbolName="ToolDef" /> ToolDef

Protocol defining a tool that can be used by LLMs.

## <ApiType type="Class" path="agents/base_agent/index" symbolName="BaseAgent" /> BaseAgent

Agent class for generating responses using LLMs with tools.
